channel.description: Recent content in Github Copilot on Anton Sizikov

item.title: Monitoring GitHub Copilot Adoption with Metrics
item.description:
Introduction

Since GitHub released the Copilot usage metrics dashboard and API in public preview back in October, I’ve been spending a lot of time helping enterprise administrators understand Copilot’s impact using these metrics.

item.title: Hey Copilot!
item.description: So, you’ve got an idea of a new app or a web site, that you wish to build with GitHub Copilot.

item.title: Teaching GitHub Copilot New SQL Dialects with Reusable Prompts
item.description: Have you ever struggled with GenAI tools generating incorrect or unusable code for your internal SDK or API?
